results.name: Triangle read by rows related to A001700
formula: Bisection of triangle A191314 extracting odd numbered rows. Accessing odd numbered columns of A205573, take finite differences of terms from the top -> down.
example: First few rows of the triangle =
Row 3 = (1, 7, 2) = row 5 of triangle A191314; and finite differences of column 5 of triangle A205573: (1, 8, 10,...)
results.author: _Gary W. Adamson_, Feb 01 2012
